title: Twitter snaps up company focused on enhancing notifications with on-device privacy
content:
Jay Sullivan, Head of Consumer Products at Twitter, announced today that Twitter has acquired OpenBack. OpenBack is a mobile management platform based out of Dublin. The team will join Twitter’s Bluebird product team to focus on improving the platform’s notification system.

more…

The post Twitter snaps up company focused on enhancing notifications with on-device privacy appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Twitter announced today it has acquired mobile management platform OpenBack in an effort to improve its notification system.
